item.title: My MonSec Experience
item.description: As I conclude my time at the Monash Cyber Security Club (MonSec) committee, I’ve written this summary of my journey with this incredible club.

item.description: Prompt # I accidentally set my system shell to the Python help() function!

item.title: DownUnderCTF Does It Fit My CTF?
item.description: Prompt # Cheers for that, I’m assuming you’ve worked out that I’m YouTuber… What’s my channel name?

item.title: DownUnderCTF Honk Honk
item.description: Prompt # I’m shocking when it comes to remembering when my car’s CTP is up…can you let me know the exact date (DD/MM/YYYY) when it’s due?

item.title: SHELL CTF How to Defeat a Dragon
item.description: Prompt # Dragonairre, the dragon with the hexadecimal head has attacked the village to take revenge on his last defeat, we need to get the ultimate weapon.
